root.name: The Simpsons: Virtual Springfield
root.description: The Simpsons: Virtual Springfield is a first-person exploration game that allows the player to explore a 3D version of Springfield. The goal of the game is to find character cards that are hidden around the town. The game makes countless references to episodes in the long-running television series and allows you to interact with all the characters from the show. Besides exploring Springfield, players are also able to partake in various mini-games like a waterballoon fight or playing arcades games in Springfield's virtual arcade.
